p: Replacement of the hexyl group in compound 16a by 4-methoxyphenyl afforded compound 17a with slight decrease in cytotoxicity against both MCF-7 and A2780 cells, while significant reduction in activity against HT29 cells was observed. Substitution on the phenyl ring (A) in compound 17a with 4-CH 3/Cl resulted in increase in cytotoxic activity against HT29 cells, while cytotoxicity against MCF-7 was decreases, Figure 6.
